comment: Tania is the best professor I have ever had. She cares about her students as if they were her children and is accessible any time if you need help with school or if you need advise. Thank you for being such a great leader and inspiration. Sincerely a student and human who you made a profound impact on that will last a lifetime.

Professor Rochelle has been my favorite professor so far at KSU. She didn't give many assignments and is seriously the easiest grader. She is caring about you as a person and wants you to pass the class, which is easy to do. If you have to take any english class, take her for it!

Prof Rochelle is the BEST! She makes english class stress-free and genuinely cares! We had very few papers compared to most eng classes, she grades easy and tries to help you do better. She is very understanding and SERIOUSLY TAKE HER CLASS NOW!!! You won't regret it!!

If she has a class open. What are you doing you better add it right now!! Literally the best English prof Ive ever had!! Incredibly understanding, and caring!!! So glad I was able to take her. Lots of interesting group discussions that get often serious, funny, and even off topic sometimes. Always looked forward to coming to this class every MW!

For her World Lit class, we read two novels, a few short stories, and some essays and had simple tests that you can make an A on if you did the study guide and read the novel. We had class discussions that were very inspirational, so it was fun to hear everyones thoughts about the pieces we were reading. Participation matters greatly.
Professor Rochelle is the sweetest professor ever!!! Her class is very laid back and chill. She gives 2/3 papers and discussions

She's def a good choice for this class. A lot of our assignments were not completed because of covid, but from when I had her, I enjoyed the class. She really likes the students who participate and it's really easy in a small class like this one.

She was my professor for 1101 and 1102. She was very caring and meet with students if they were going through a rough time. We had 2.5 paper, the last was about a movie. She lets you correct your essays for full points back. She looks and seems like your typical college english professor.

Only 3 papers in the entire class. Didn't follow the syllabus. Attendance is mandatory, easy grader. Would definitely take her, great professor. She also likes to bring in treats for her students a lot.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: She's a really cool professor. Each class was fun and she makes sure that you participate in discussions. She told us that she doesn't really care if everything she taught stuck with you as long as you made a friend and felt like a better writer.

Prof Rochelle is very caring. Even though she does not grade anything until the end, she gives great feedback on papers and extends due dates. she is very understanding(and has a great sense of style). Discussions every week are interesting and attendance is random.
Rochelle is a solid professor and everyone had fun in her class. We had weekly discussions, and it brought the class closer together. Do the work and you'll get an A(LITERALLY).
Does not grade in time. Provides very little feedback. Other than that, good professor. She gives you an A for effort so that was appreciated!

Professor Rochelle has to be hands down the best professor for English 1102. Her class gets the whole class to open up about various discussion questions, which are very fun. She even brought us donuts a few times. She is super easy to talk to and wants the best from everyone in the class. Highly recommend her class.

She is mad easy and gives everyone A's if you attempt your best effort. I recommend for the easy A. She also is a nice lady and is willing to help you if you reach out to her. I'd easily take her again for another language arts class.

She is a nice person but doesn't teach that well. She also gives really bad feedback on papers. The discussions in the class were very thought provoking, but the online portion (I took the hybrid class) was a little better than mediocre. My high school freshman English class was harder (and more enjoyable). This class is tolerable, but not for me.

She's the most understanding teacher I've ever had. She's super laid back, and most of the classes are discussions, so as long as you have something to say, you'll pass this class with flying colours.

Very laid back professor. However, when it comes to writing papers her topics are NEVER clear so you have to kinda guess. She says she follows MLA format but she doesnt know what MLA is and has us do our papers incorrectly. Yes, she counts off if you do it the right way. If you want a class where you learn, shes not the one. Easy A? Go for it

I had her for my first college semester, I was honestly scared at first because she has a somewhat easy going, poetic vibe. She is very understanding of any problem that comes into your life, if you befriend her she will do the same to you. She grades heavy on commas and that is about it. I have gotten all A's on my essays, she did not fail anyone.
I absolutely loved her!! Very laid back, amazing atmosphere in class. Papers were not hard at all, just watch your grammar. She is by far the most caring professor I've had. Next to no homework
Great professor !! Definitely would recommend !!

Best English teacher ever! We only wrote 2.5 essays all semester, and she's so nice. She creates a very laid-back, friendly class environment where we were all comfortable expressing our opinions and participating in class.
mrs. rochelle is an amazing professor... since most are required to take english 1101, i highly recommend taking her!!

Lots of Discussions in class that are fun and let you talk about anything that relates to the topic. Papers are not to long and she gives you ample time to do them, along with giving you classtime to work and edit them. Take HER. Take HER. Taker HER!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
